examples: We've driven a/one hundred miles in the last two hours.
There were hundreds of people at the pool today.
He expects the total amount to be in the low hundreds.

definitions.definition: the years of a particular century:
examples: The house was built in the sixteen hundreds.

definitions.definition: used to say the time using the 24-hour system, especially used in the military:
examples: Breakfast is at seven hundred hours.
